name: MEGADECK cyberpunk city builder tarot deck
name_original: MEGADECK cyberpunk city builder tarot deck
description:
MEGADECK is your print and play Powerglove for SPRAWLSCAPE. 

but fits in a pocket because it's Tarots.

If 3 minutes for creating a city were too much, this tool makes it within seconds. 

  • Shuffle the deck.
  • Choose how big you want the city to be (X).
  • Draw cards, arrange them on the table.
  • That's it. 

(well, if you get it here you need to print them beforehand)

There's no need to look up on the manual what they are: all necessary infos are on the cards. 

The front of the cards shows the map tile, 1d4 Events, 30+ between named locations and encounters.

Each card is a pointcrawl. I sometimes use the named locations and encounters as inspiration, as I would use a spark table, other times I just stick to it. 

The flipside lists the description of the area, 4 different oracles, and some more stuff (showing is quicker than explaining)

What does it add to SPRAWLS? 

The description of the Sectors is duplicated from SPRAWLS but it's expanded upon whenever there was space to do so. Sometimes is hooks, NPCs, or part of the description I had to cut to fit in A5 format) 

There are now 4 unique events for EACH card (SPRAWLS lists only 52 events), a ton of named locations (1,5k+?), and the encounters. And it also makes SPRAWLS more quick and intuitive for people with visual memory.

Have fun! I'd like to see your creations, if you feel like send some pictures.

This listings contains 2 files. The first is the PDF to print the 53 cards.

The other file is the MegaDir. Contains a version of the deck printable in A5 format, along with extensive design notes, and other supplemental material to play. 

It's 94 pages. 

 Physical copies of the MegaDeck can be ordered on DTcards (printed in US), and on Mangusta website (EU-friendly shipping, hand–crafted version)
